name: Fever (Official Music Video)
lyrics:
[00:32.92]Before you came around, I was doing just fine
[00:37.18]Usually, usually, usually, I don't pay no mind
[00:40.66]And when it came down, I was looking in your eyes
[00:44.91]Suddenly, suddenly, suddenly I can feel it inside
[00:49.19]I've got a fever, so can you check?
[00:53.18]Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
[00:57.41]And when you touch me, baby, I turn red
[01:01.43]I've got a fever, so can you check?
[01:10.19]Peut-être qu'avec du temps, ça partira
[01:13.92]Et pourtant, et pourtant, et pourtant, je ne m'y vois pas
[01:17.91]Comme un médicament, moi, je suis rien sans toi
[01:22.16]Et je sais que, je sais que jе perds du temps dans tes bras
[01:26.66]I'vе got a fever, so can you check?
[01:30.43]Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
[01:34.95]And when you touch me, baby, I turn red
[01:38.93]I've got a fever, so can you check?
[01:43.42]Car dans mes yeux, ça se voit
[01:45.90]La fièvre dans mes yeux, oui, ça se voit
[01:49.66]Mon cœur se serre, j'ai du feu dans la voix
[01:52.16]Le plus souvent, c'est quand je pense à toi
[01:57.67]I've got a fever, can you check?
[02:01.69]Hand on my forehead, kiss my neck
[02:05.69]And when you touch me, baby, I turn red (I turn red)
[02:09.66]I've got a fever, so can you check? (Amour en fièvre)
[02:48.16]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[02:50.68]Tell me what you wanna do right now (Amour en fièvre)
[02:52.42]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[02:54.67]'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down (Amour en fièvre)
[02:56.66]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[02:58.69]Tell me what you wanna do right now (Amour en fièvre)
[03:00.69]Tell me what you wanna do right now
[03:02.42]'Cause I don't really wanna cool it down
[03:04.43]Car dans mes yeux, ça se voit (Amour en fièvre)
[03:09.41]La fièvre dans les yeux, oui, ça se voit (Amour en fièvre)
[03:12.67]Mon cœur se serre, j'ai du feu dans la voix (Amour en fièvre)
[03:17.20]Le plus souvent, c'est quand je pense à toi (Amour en fièvre)

name: Alice
lyrics:

[00:17.54]Ah, ah, ah, ah
[00:20.04]Ah, ah, ah, ah (Ah)
[00:23.10]Set me free (Ah-ah-ah)
[00:25.60]Ah, ah, ah, ah
[00:27.52]Ah, ah, ah, ah (Ah)
[00:30.33]Set me free (Ah-ah-ah)
[00:33.12]Could you pull me out of this alive? (Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah)
[00:41.19]Where's my body? I'm stuck in my mind (Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah)

[00:56.78](Oh m-mother, oh m-mother)

[01:37.52]Screaming at the top of my lungs
[01:39.45]Think I might've just left myself behind

[01:47.17]Take me on a trip, DJ, free my mind
[01:50.53]My name isn't Alice
[01:54.19]But I'll keep looking, I'll keep looking for Wonderland

name: West Coast
lyrics:
[00:17.18]Down on the West Coast, they got a saying
[00:19.18]"If you're not drinkin', then you're not playing'"
[00:24.43]But you've got the music
[00:26.94]You've got the music in you, don't you?
[00:32.92]Down on the West Coast, I get this feeling like
[00:36.43]It all could happen, that's why I'm leaving
[00:39.92]You for the moment
[00:41.93]You for the moment, Boy Blue, yeah you
[00:47.68]You're feelin' hot at the show, I'm feelin' hot to the touch
[00:51.43]You say I'll miss you and I wanna say I'll miss you so much
[00:55.42]Something keeps me real quiet, I'm alive, I'm a lush
[00:58.93]Your love, your love, your love
[01:04.93]I can see my baby swinging
[01:10.92]His Parliament's on fire and his hands are up
[01:14.67]On the balcony and I'm singing
[01:19.67]Ooh baby, Ooh baby, I'm in love
[01:25.95]I can see my sweet boy swaying
[01:30.18]He's crazy y Cubano como yo, my love
[01:35.43]On the balcony and I'm saying
[01:38.94]Move baby, move baby, I'm in love
[01:43.68]I'm in love
[01:45.92](I'm in love)
[01:47.92]I'm in love
[01:49.42](I'm in love)
[01:54.92](Mic-check)
[01:55.92](One, two, one, two)
[01:59.43](One, two, get it, girl!)
[01:59.92]Down on the West Coast they got their icons
[02:03.18]Their silver starlets, their Queens of Saigon
[02:07.17]And you've got the music
[02:09.18]You've got the music in you, don't you?
[02:14.43]Down on the West Coast they love their movies
[02:19.18]Their golden gods and Rock & Roll groupies
[02:22.43]And you've got the music
[02:24.42]You've got the music in you, don't you?
[02:29.93]You push it hard up all the way, I'm feeling hotter than fire
[02:33.68]I guess that no one ever really made me feel that much higher
[02:37.67]Te deseo cariño, boy it's you I desire
[02:41.92]Your love, your love, your love
[02:48.18]I can see my baby swinging
[02:52.67]His Parliament's on fire and his hands are up
[02:56.68]On the balcony and I'm singing
[03:01.17]Ooh baby, Ooh baby, I'm in love
[03:07.68]I can see my sweet boy swaying
[03:11.92]He's crazy y Cubano como yo, my love
[03:16.93]On the balcony and I'm saying
[03:20.43]Move baby, move baby, I'm in love
[03:26.68]I can see my baby swinging
[03:31.17]His Parliament's on fire and his hands are up
[03:36.43]On the balcony and I'm singing
[03:39.42]Ooh baby, Ooh baby, I'm in love
[03:46.17]I can see my sweet boy swaying
[03:50.68]He's crazy y Cubano como yo, my love
[03:55.42]On the balcony and I'm saying
[03:58.67]Move baby, move baby, I'm in love
[04:04.18]I'm in love
[04:06.17]I'm in love.

name: Bad Friend
lyrics:
[00:11.54]We ran through the bright Tokyo lights, nothing to lose
[00:16.30]Summer of 2012, burnt in my mind
[00:22.78]Hot, crazy, and drunk, five in a room
[00:26.14]Singing our hearts out to Carly, sweat in our eyes
[00:32.93]Throwing drinks at each other
[00:36.01]Making fun of our lovers
[00:38.56]Getting kicked out on the street, oh
[00:43.63]We were best friends forever, but the truth is
[00:48.37]I'm so good at crashing in
[00:50.92]Making sparks and shit, but then
[00:54.30]I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[00:58.51]So don't ask me where I've been
[01:01.06]Been avoiding everything
[01:04.43]'Cause I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[01:08.36]I'm a bad friend, yeah
[01:17.66]Guess we fell out, what was that all about?
[01:21.79]Maybe I overreacted, well, maybe you shouldn't have...
[01:27.63]God, it's insane how things can change like that
[01:31.61]Don't even know where you are
[01:35.27]What you do and who you do it with
[01:39.23]Throwing drinks at each other
[01:41.51]Making fun of our lovers
[01:44.06]Getting kicked out on the street, oh
[01:49.18]We were best friends forever, but the truth is
[01:53.97]I'm so good at crashing in
[01:56.49]Making sparks and shit, but then
[02:00.14]I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[02:04.12]So don't ask me where I've been
[02:06.40]Been avoiding everything
[02:10.06]'Cause I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[02:15.18]Put your hands up if you're not good at this stuff
[02:19.16]Put your hands up if you're not good at this stuff
[02:29.92](Oh, I'm a bad friend, oh yeah, oh yeah)
[02:34.63]Put your hands up if you're not good at this stuff
[02:40.02](Should we put the bridges back together?)
[02:42.86]Maybe I'm a bad friend
[02:44.53]I'm so good at crashing in
[02:46.80]Making sparks and shit, but then
[02:50.49]I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[02:54.75]So don't ask me where I've been
[02:57.27]Been avoiding everything (Everything)
[03:00.67]'Cause I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[03:04.88]I'm so good at crashing in
[03:07.16]Making sparks and shit, but then
[03:10.81]I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
[03:14.79]So don't ask me where I've been
[03:17.30]Been avoiding everything
[03:20.71]'Cause I'm a bad, I'm a bad, I'm a bad friend
